title: "It's just a Game"
body:
**_The phrase “it’s just a game” is such a weak mindset. You are ok with what happened, losing, imperfection of a craft. When you stop getting angry after losing, you’ve lost twice. 
There’s always something to learn, and always room for improvement, never settle._**
     
---- NINJA
---------------
Exactly what this League of Legends community is made out of
Weak Mindset, maybe more too
---------------
Because Riot Allow people to fuck around and let the worst players get away with things is why this game is such a joke and why no one really gives a fuck about the Esport scene.

Why Reporters or people who have no idea of the gaming industry make fun of gamers, is because you have idiot with this type of mindset and then you also game company like RiotGames always trying to compare their "Online Game" to real Sport such as NBA. 

You can't compare your trash game and it's community to a real sport when you can't even give the players on an "Online Game" in a real environment of players who actually try their hardest every time they que for a game, but no you get idiots and troll and Riot let them get away with it **#Nubrac ** 
and instead punish those who are actually trying.... ???????? WTF???????
